turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good day Assistant Yes. I want you to help me order three medium thin crust pizza with meat lovers as toppings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you want meatlovers for all 3 pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's okay. Give me a review of my order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, 3 medium thin crust meatlover pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. That is good. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all for now, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
